mapper.insert:
insert into td_shipper (customer_id,code,reg_address,capital,level,has_permit,name,short_name,tax_no,business_type,car_number,linkman,owner,phone,tel,cert_status,cert_valid_time,has_inovice,desc,create_user,create_time,update_user,update_time) values
( #{entity.customerId,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.code,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.regAddress,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.capital,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.level,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.hasPermit,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.name,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.shortName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.taxNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.businessType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.carNumber,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.linkman,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.owner,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.phone,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.tel,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.certStatus,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.certValidTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{entity.hasInovice,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.desc,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.createUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{entity.updateUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.updateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} )
